name: 尤信程
objective: 本科目所探討的內容包括: 1. 集合與命題, 2. 關聯, 3. 函式, 4. 基礎圖論, 5.樹狀結構
schedule:
Week 1:Adminstrative announcemence. Set Intro.
Week 2,3: Set
Week 4,5: Proof & induction
Week 6,8: Formal logic
Week 7: Holiday
Week 9: MT
Week 10,11,12: Relations
Week 13,14: Functions 
Week 15,16,17: Graph theory  
Week 18: Final
materials: Reference textbook: Discrete mathematics for computer science
